statements.statement:
SELECT TRIM(KPS.PICKING_LIST_NO) PICKING_LIST_NO, KPS.SEND_TIME SEND_TIME, KPS.END_TIME END_TIME, TO_CHAR(KPICR.DELIVERY_INSTRUCTION_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') DELIVERY_INSTRUCTION_DATE, TRIM(KPS.AREA_NM) AREA_NM, CASE WHEN KPS.STATUS = 0 THEN '未着手' WHEN KPS.STATUS = 1 THEN '未着手' WHEN KPS.STATUS = 2 THEN '着手中' WHEN KPS.STATUS = 8 THEN '完了(未完あり)' WHEN KPS.STATUS = 9 THEN '完了' END STATUS, NVL(CAU.USER_NM, KPS.USER_ID) PICKING_USER FROM TT_HR_KANBAN_PICKING_SUMMARY KPS LEFT JOIN TM_CC_AUTH_USER CAU ON KPS.USER_ID = CAU.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TT_HR_KANBAN_PICKING_IDENTIFICATION_CARD_RECORD KPICR ON KPS.PICKING_LIST_NO = KPICR.PICKING_LIST_NO AND KPICR.DISP_ORDER IN ( SELECT DISP_ORDER FROM TT_HR_KANBAN_PICKING_DETAIL KPD WHERE KPS.PICKING_LIST_NO = KPD.PICKING_LIST_NO AND KPICR.DISP_ORDER = KPD.DISP_ORDER AND KPD.PARTS_NUMBER LIKE #partsNumber# ) AND #partsNumber# IS NOT NULL
to_char(KPS.SEND_TIME,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #sendFrom#
to_char(KPS.SEND_TIME,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #sendTo#
to_char(KPS.END_TIME,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #endFrom#
to_char(KPS.END_TIME,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #endTo#
KPS.STATUS IN
#status[]#
KPS.AREA_NM = #areaName#
KPS.USER_ID = #userId#
KPS.PICKING_LIST_NO LIKE (#pickingNo# || '%')
EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TT_HR_KANBAN_PICKING_DETAIL KPD WHERE KPD.PARTS_NUMBER LIKE #partsNumber# || '%' AND KPS.PICKING_LIST_NO = KPD.PICKING_LIST_NO )
ORDER BY KPS.SEND_TIME DESC, KPICR.DELIVERY_INSTRUCTION_DATE ASC

SELECT KPS.PICKING_LIST_NO, KPS.SEND_TIME, KPS.AREA_NM, NVL(CAU.USER_NM, KPS.USER_ID) PICKING_USER, KPD.DISP_ORDER, KPD.PARTS_NUMBER, KPD.MATERIAL_NAME, KPD.ZAIKAN_PRIMARY_LOCATION PRIMARY_LOCATION, KPD.ZAIKAN_SECONDARY_LOCATION || '-' || KPD.ZAIKAN_TERTIARY_LOCATION SECONDARY_TERTIARY_LOCATION, KPD.SNP, KPD.PICKING_BOX_COUNT, ORD.MIN_DELIVERY_INST_DT, ORD.UNPAID_QTY FROM TT_HR_KANBAN_PICKING_SUMMARY KPS LEFT JOIN TM_CC_AUTH_USER CAU ON KPS.USER_ID = CAU.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TT_HR_KANBAN_PICKING_DETAIL KPD ON KPS.PICKING_LIST_NO = KPD.PICKING_LIST_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RRO.DELIVERY_INST_DT MIN_DELIVERY_INST_DT, RRO.UNPAID_QTY, RRO.CUT_PARTS_NUM FROM ( SELECT PRO.DELIVERY_INST_DT, SUM(PRO.UNPAID_QTY)OVER(PARTITION BY PRO.CUT_PARTS_NUM,DELIVERY_INST_DT) UNPAID_QTY, PRO.CUT_PARTS_NUM, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(PARTITION BY PRO.CUT_PARTS_NUM ORDER BY PRO.DELIVERY_INST_DT) RANK FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(RO.DELIVERY_INST_DT,'DD') DELIVERY_INST_DT, RO.UNPAID_QTY, SUBSTR(RO.PARTS_NUM,0,10) CUT_PARTS_NUM FROM TT_KW_RELEASED_ORDER RO WHERE RO.UNPAID_QTY != 0 AND SUBSTR(RO.DELIVERY_POINT,3,1) IN ('3','4','5','9') ) PRO ) RRO WHERE RRO.RANK = 1 ) ORD ON KPD.PARTS_NUMBER = ORD.CUT_PARTS_NUM WHERE KPS.STATUS = '8' AND KPD.STATUS IN ('0','1')
KPS.SEND_TIME >= #sendFrom#
KPS.SEND_TIME <= #sendTo#
KPS.AREA_NM = #areaName#
KPD.ZAIKAN_PRIMARY_LOCATION = #primaryLocation#
KPD.ZAIKAN_SECONDARY_LOCATION = #secondaryLocation#
KPD.ZAIKAN_TERTIARY_LOCATION = #tertiaryLocation#
KPS.USER_ID = #userId#
KPD.PARTS_NUMBER LIKE #partsNumber# || '%'
KPS.PICKING_LIST_NO LIKE #pickingNo# || '%'
ORDER BY KPS.SEND_TIME DESC, KPD.DISP_ORDER
